title: Firefox continues to connect to detectportal.firefox.com even after network.captive-portal-service.enabled is set to false
content:
Basically as per the title.

My organisation blocks detectportal.firefox.com at the device level using Windows Defender. Every time Firefox attempts to connect to detectportal.firefox.com I get an intrusive toast telling me about this. I have set network.captive-portal-service.enabled to false in the config, which has greatly reduced the number of connection attempts and therefore intrusive alerts, but it has not stopped them completely. Does anyone know why this is? Is it a bug?
creator: bruce.leyden

title: Firefox Security Risk Warning
content: Many times Firefox will give an incorrect security warning. This has been occurring for more than two years, across many websites/Firefox updates. Currently using Windows 10 and Firefox 97 (Firefox is set to clear all cookies/information when closing). EXAMPLE: Open browser (Firefox) and in the URL type the website (e.g. shrepc) Press CTRL + ENTER to auto-fill the URL Firefox displays message "Warning: Potential Security Risk Ahead" giving the options to "Go Back" or "Advanced" At this point close Firefox. Open Firefox again. In the URL link type "www.shrepc.com" and press ENTER The website is displayed with no errors. Has anyone else experienced this?
creator: timos321

title: Disqus comments do not update when using Firefox
content:
Disqus comments do not update for me when using Firefox, but they do update when using other browsers. By update, I mean that when your are on a Disqus comment page, what you should see is a bar at the top stating how many new comments have been added. You should see new responses to comments as a link that you can click on to display the update. You should see "one other person is typing" before a new response is displayed. It is dynamic and real-time. With Firefox, all I see is a static comments page with no updates. I must refresh the page to see changes, and the changes are not highlighted.

To see this behavior, or lack thereof, you must be on an active, popular page that is actually being changed in real time. Below is a link to one at The Hill that is active now.

https://thehill.com/homenews/administration/595707-biden-says-us-will-sanction-russian-banks-impose-export-controls#bottom-story-socials

If you check it later, the comment window may have become inactive. Then you will need to find another popular story by looking in the right margin of the story display.

The way to see this is to have Firefox and another browser open concurrently on your desktop task bar to the same window. I use Firefox and Edge on my desktop. I use Samsung Internet on my phone. Only Firefox fails to update. Tech support people in my orbit have confirmed this behavior but have no suggestions.

Kindly let me know if there is a fix.
creator: Peter_Smith

title: am trying to sync iphone firefox to windows 11
content: Just downloaded Firefox app for iphone 13. Have created account. Have signed into the SAME account on my windows 11 pc using firefox browser. want to sync them. sounds simple enough. I am prompted to scan qr code using my iphone. everytime i try to do this, the firefox browser (which is ALREADY SIGNED INTO MY ACCOUNT) keeps popping up a window asking for the firefox password (why? i am already signed in). i enter it, and the window pops up again. it is the CORRECT password. what is going on? why is this so difficult to accomplish? Thanks
creator: hood-buoy-0z

title: how to create link to send large attachments
content: How to create link to send large attachments by email
creator: jmcginn41

title: Why does cert9.db continually get corrupted?
content:
Hi,

Almost daily, I have to delete cert9.db and restart Firefox, otherwise I can't access some websites, or even web interfaces of local devices on our LAN.

security.enterprise_roots.enabled is greyed out, so I can't change that but it is set to "true", which I believe means that it should be using Windows Cert store and not cert9.db. Yet still, deleting cert9.db is the solution to my issues.

Can anyone advise on what I can do for a more permanent fix?

Thanks,

M
creator: grumpy999

title: an't connect to Yahoo via Firefox nor other browsers on my PC
content:
for some reason, my ability to connect via Firefox (or my other browsers) to Yahoo has stopped. I have cleared out all temporary files and cookies with no resolution. I do not seem to have any difficulties reaching any other sites and I have not changed any settings for my internet network, McAfee security, etc. All my apps and MS operating systems are fully up to date. I know that Yahoo Mail is up and running as I can access on other devices (IPhone, IPad, Samsung phone, etc.)

many thanks for sharing any recommended solutions
creator: david.small74

title: Link to specific page of pdf does not work with Firefox
content:
Hello, I want to add a link in a web page to a PDF file which takes you to a specific page of the PDF file. All the instructions I have found so far tell me to e.g. add #page=6 to the end of the link if I want to link to page 6.

However, whether this works or not seems to depend on the browser used, I have found the situation to be as follows: Edge, Chrome, IE: PDF opens to desired page Firefox: Only opens the PDF on the first page of the document.

Does anyone know a solution for this?

Thanks for your help, Rebecca
creator: ReBaWa

title: HOW TO MAKE FIREFOX MY DEFAULT BROWSER
content: How do I make firefox my default browser? Thank you

title: I finnally got in. Who signed in before me? I have been sitting here all night and I did NOT sign in earlier. IT WAS NOT ME!!!
content: I cant find my emails. Also who did you allow into my account???? I have not been at my pc or phone till now. So someone must have changed my password. And that is why my passwords have changed! How do I access my emails?
creator: smile.its.dawn

title: Text is scrambled
content:
Running a Mac

Just updated to Monterey 12.2 and using Firefox 97.0.1 64 bit. As soon as the updates occured, several websites now have scrambled text. (see attachment for example) Only some parts of the page are scrambled so perhaps it's some kind of HTML error...?

I tried uninstalling and reinstalling the browser but no changes.

Does not occur on every website and does not occur in other browsers...
creator: CurtLernerPhotography

title: not finding a website
content: I can't find the website; https://bit-climb.com and I have an account there? how can I connect to there?
creator: rudobohl

title: gmail will need javascript going forward
content:
I received this message yesterday: 

'''Dear Administrator,

Starting on March 24, 2022 Accessing Google accounts with a browser that does not support JavaScript or that has JavaScript turned off does not allow Google to run a complete risk analysis. This puts your organization's accounts at increased risk of phishing and takeover by malicious actors. 

users will no longer be able to sign into their Google accounts on browsers that do not support JavaScript or that have JavaScript turned off. This means they won’t be able to access Google Workspace services, such as Gmail and Drive, unless they change to browsers supporting JavaScript or turn it on in their current browsers. ''

Will firefox have a option to allow javascript? Firefox is my browser and I would hate to have to go somewhere else, however if I cant to get my email I will have no choice. please advise
creator: brian100

title: Full screen video player resizing/changing position
content:
When I open a video on Twitch, YouTube,... and put the video on full screen, every time the video gets moved to the right. When I leave the full screen and comes back then the problem doesn't happen any more until I close and re-open Firefox.

I've tried it on my 2560 x 1440 144hz monitor and my 1920 x 1080 60hz, so it isn't due to the resolution of my screen. The problem isn't due to the dual monitor because my screen on the left has the same problem on the same side. 

When I opened the Troubleshoot mode the problem was fixed. The extensions I've aren't causing this ( because I've the problem without ) and my theme too because I've none.

I already got this problem a while ago and don't remember how I fixed it. I've putted a screenshot of the top left of my screen.
creator: Daluca

title: Blocco casella
content:
Quando attivo il comando "scarica messaggi" sulla casella di posta ordinaria compare il messaggio: "Si sta per modificare il modo in cui Thuderbird identifica questo sito." E ancora, in grassetto: "Banche, negozi, e altri siti pubblici non chiederanno di fare questa operazione. Indirizzo: pop3.(segue l'estensione del mio dominio):995" Il tutto con un comando "Acquisisci certificato" E l'indicazione "Salva eccezione in modo permanente" "Conferma eccezione di sicurezza", altro. Il risultato è che qualunque comando dia la casella è bloccata, non scarico più i messaggi da questo indirizzo. Nota bene: altre due caselle (PEC, peraltro) collegate al browser funzionano regolarmente.

Qualcuno, una qualche anima buona, sa dirmi di che si tratta e cosa devo fare? Nel frattempo ho fatto una scansione approfondita con Norton Antivirus e non segnala nulla e comunque il problema di ripresenta.

Allego lo screenshot del messaggio.

Grazie in anticipo. Giorgio
creator: giorgio.tomasino

title: E-mail access
content:
I have been using Netaddress email (classic), paid for version, on Firefox for a while (20 years perhaps) without untoward difficulty until about two months ago when on accessing my e-mails and when trying to view "contacts" the site produced the error message:

Bad Request

Your browser sent a request that this server could not understand. Size of a request header field exceeds server limit.

This prevents me from writing, saving to fraft and sending my e-mails but does not prevent me from reading e-mails or saving attachments on the computer. Happily Safari works on my computer and iPhone and Ecosia works on my iPhone. The computer is a somewhat upgraded 8three years ago) Apple MacBook Pro 15" from 2010 and has no other obvious changes recently.

Your assistance would be grately appreciated David Stevenson

title: Dark Mode Trouble
content:
Once I selected Dark Mode to see what it was about and didn't like it. So I switched it back and it won't go away. I have reset to defaults and it works until I select another web page and then boom, I'm back in Dark Mode. This is an issue because if I switch to any other browser, there is no problem. I am about to uninstall your browser and go to Edge or Chrome and I do not want to do that. I have been with Firefox for a long time but never have seen this problem before. Please help me stay a loyal Firefox user.

C. Hoag
creator: cjhoag

title: Google Maps goes Black
content: Google maps loads correctly and after a few seconds it turns black and you can't see anything... i have removed add-ons and turned off hardware acceleration and cleared cache but nothing works for more than a minute... how can we fix this?
creator: classicstingray

title: I changed my email ages ago, But when i try to log in with linux or firefox portable it doesn't work
content:
I changed my email address in firefox settings a while ago, had no problems since. But recently wanted to use firefox portable. What happens is, i log in with my (new) email, I get sent an authentication code to the new email, i type it in, then it tries to login with my old email and obviously fails (Incorrect password)

If i try it too many times my account locks, don't know what to do
creator: leah2185155

title: Access bookmarks from old computer
content:
My other computer was recently stolen and when I logged into Firefox on my new one, none of the bookmarks were there. I can see my old laptop under connected services in "Firefox accounts" and wonder if there's a way to access them from there somehow.

Note: I double checked which profile I was logged into (suggestion from forum) and switched to the other one, but it shows the same thing. I also tried to "sync" as soon as I logged in on the new computer, but none of my old bookmarks show up after doing this either.

Any help is greatly appreciated!
creator: fmgonzal08

title: whatsweb não conecta
content: ao acessar o endereço https://web.whatsapp.com/ pelo Firefox, e escanear o código pelo celular, a página do whats não abre, o Firefox fica se atualizando interminavelmente e não abre o whats web, em outros navegadores consigo conectar normalmente pelo whats web. Mas não quero usar outros navegadores, gosto do Firefox. :) Já fiz a restauração, já desinstalei, instalei e não consigo. Outros sites navegam normalmente
creator: tiagohtti

title: 403 Forbidden in Mac
content:
Thank you to the kind replies I received on how to sort my access to

Disneylivecams.com.

However all replies must relate to pc options and not mac as the headings are not there in mac as the kind people have asked me to look for

Any other Ideas please
creator: garyfriar

title: saving tabs on startup
content:
Hi,

My tabs from my previous session aren't being saved on start up even though I have that option selected in my preferences. Often, it will bring up four tabs I had from six years ago. Today, it brought up tabs from a session I had last week. I have tried going to history, but there is no 'restore session or tabs' option; just the option to choose from recently closed tabs.

Thanks,
creator: melissa.cooke

title: Google Blogger
content: Blogger is not loading properly. Very slow & data not loading properly. Suggested solution that I'm using Blogger in Draft didn't work. Private browsing stops Roboform from working.
creator: ValCar2

title: Show bookmark directory in URL bar?
content: Is there an extension or option to show the directory instead of the star icon?
creator: Yinmin

title: Cookies/Session not working correctly on current firefox version.
content:
Hi,

I have built a websites since a 5 years ago but in current Firefox version when user logout cookies/session are not clearing, when user refresh they automatically showing as a login but only previous browsed pages if they access new page then site showing logout and some time intermittent loop between login and logout, this is since a new Firefox version.

Site built on PHP 5.6 and Codeigniter framework
creator: saqib.khan

title: reader view icon missing (version 97.0.1)
content: I'm currently using FF 97.0.1 64 bit. Is reader view no longer available?
creator: dplant

title: Remembered passwords not showing
content:
I have Firefox browser 97.0 (64-bit) installed. It remembers 30-40 passwords so I always log in with ease, but recently when I go to security tab and click to show saved logins, only 3 would show. All others are remembered and log in fine, but I cannot show them, which only happened recently, so it happened after a newer version was installed, I assume.

How can I show all remembered passwords? Thank you.

title: Firefox addon Video Download helper no longer works on Macintosh
content: I have been using the add on Video Downloadhelper with Firefox browser for a couple of years now, and all of a sudden, out of nowhere it no longer will work, claiming I need to install a thing called a companion app. (attached).... https://user-media-prod-cdn.itsre-sumo.mozilla.net/uploads/images/2022-02-23-22-31-04-0f2318.png This was never a problem until recently the last week or so, because it would ask whether I wanted to use the companion app. or browser to download, now it will only use the companion app. to download videos. This is only a problem because Macintosh, and Apple are such kill joys when it comes to security that nothing works on them, and it will not install the companion app, because it cannot scan it for viruses or some such nonsense. (attached) https://user-media-prod-cdn.itsre-sumo.mozilla.net/uploads/images/2022-02-23-22-31-14-480a6b.png I swear to god, I wish to the lord above that I had NEVER switched over to an Apple computer from my Windows machines, but I thought it was supposed to be a better device, not realizing that it is secure to the point where almost NOTHING can be installed on it. I just do not get how this makes for a better computer experience at all. It all seems like overkill to me, and ridiculous when you cannot even use addons for a browser anymore without the Apple Super Geeks deciding not to allow it for whatever ignorant reason, but making a computer that cannot use any software you didn't purchase from Apple does not improve the experience at all JERKS. It would be different if Apple ever made in applications that were useful / helpful, but they don't and anything they do put out that is worth a spit costs literally THOUSANDS of Dollars because they are so full of themselves at that company that they believe they are the only ones who know how computers should work, or be used. Can someone please explain to me how to make this addon work again, even on a piece of garbage Macintrash device?? Thanks in advance!!
creator: zlloyd2

title: cannot access google drive
content: Whenever I try to access a Google doc on Google drive, I get the message, "We detected malware on this device." I ran Malwarebytes on my Mac which found nothing. I am able to access Google docs and Drive in Google Chrome browser but not in Firefox or Safari. The error message in Safari says nothing about a virus, only "We noticed unusual activity in your Google Account. To keep your account safe, you were signed out." Thanks

title: saving passwords
content:
On a secure web site, whenever I open the page a drop down menu appears asking me if I want to save the log in information or not save it. I mistakenly clicked on save. I don't want to automatically open the web site with a click of the mouse. I want to enter my account information and enter my password each time. I don't know how to reverse my mistake and have the requirement to log in each time. (Out of curiosity, just where is the password data saved?)

Additionally. how can I avoid having that nuisance window from popping open each time I want to log in? It is an extra step I don't need to make to keep answering no every time I access the site.
